definition_zh: 运用阴阳、表里、寒热、虚实八个纲领对疾病进行辨证分析的方法
definition_en: A differentiation method analyzing diseases using eight principles: yin-yang

definition_zh: 根据脏腑的生理功能和病理变化特点进行辨证分析的方法
definition_en: A differentiation method analyzing diseases based on physiological functions and pathological changes of zang-fu organs
notes: 临床最常用的辨证方法之一
